Options: 7 options

p02-q01-2-Symptoms.Worsenedpage 2 question 1.2. Have any of your symptoms worsened since your last health check? (required)1..1booleanEnable When: p02-q01-Symptoms =
p02-q01-2-1-Symptoms.Worsened.Detailspage 2 question 1.2.1. What are the details of your worsening symptoms? (required)1..1textEnable When: p02-q01-2-Symptoms.Worsened =
p03page 3. Health Context0..1group
p03-q01-Contactpage 3 question 1. Do you know if you have had any contact with someone with measles since your last health check? (required)1..1choiceOptions: 3 options
p04page 4. Quarantine0..1group
p04-q01-Visitorspage 4 question 1. We want to know if you've been around anyone who might not be immune to measles. Have you had any visitors or left where you're staying? (required)1..1text
p04-q02-Quarantinepage 4 question 2. Do you need any help to continue to quarantine? (required)1..1boolean
p04-q03-1-Quarantine.Helppage 4 question 3. Please tell us what help you need: (required)1..1textEnable When: p04-q02-Quarantine =
p05page 5. Thank you for completing the daily heath check.0..1group

p05-Rememberpage 5 q01. Remember, if you feel very sick right now contact your doctor or Healthline on 0800 611 116 for medical help. If it is an emergency call 111.0..1display
p05-Healthlinepage 5 q02. Healthline is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week if you need them. If you need to see your GP or doctor in person, always call before leaving your home to tell them you have been in contact with measles.0..1display

name: MeaslesHealthCheckQuestionnaire
title: Measles Daily Health Check
description: Te Whatu Ora survey of Symptoms, Context and Quarantine informations surrounding Measles Patients
purpose: Survey of Symptoms, Context and Quarantine informations surrounding Measles Patients

item.text: Source environment

Please complete this health check form. If you feel very sick right now contact your doctor or Healthline on 0800 611 116 for medical help. If it is an emergency call 111 and tell them you have been in contact with someone with measles.
Symptoms
Do you currently have any measles symptoms? (required) For example: fever, red blotchy rash, cough, runny nose, sore red eyes, tiny white spots inside your mouth.

extension.valueString:
Do you currently have any measles symptoms? (required)

For example: fever, red blotchy rash, cough, runny nose, sore red eyes, tiny white spots inside your mouth.

item.text: What symptoms do you currently have? (required)

valueCoding.code: Tiny white spots inside your mouth
valueCoding.display: Tiny white spots inside your mouth

item.text: Did you have a fever when you first noticed the rash? (required)
When did the rash appear? (required)
Where on your body did the rash start? If the rash has spread, provide details of where it has spread to? (required)
Provide details of your other symptoms: (required)
Have any of your symptoms worsened since your last health check? (required)
What are the details of your worsening symptoms? (required)
Health Context
Do you know if you have had any contact with someone with measles since your last health check? (required)
Quarantine
We want to know if you've been around anyone who might not be immune to measles. Have you had any visitors or left where you're staying? (required)
Do you need any help to continue to quarantine? (required)
Please tell us what help you need: (required)
Thank you for completing the daily heath check.
Remember, if you feel very sick right now contact your doctor or Healthline on 0800 611 116 for medical help. If it is an emergency call 111.

extension.valueString: Remember, if you feel very sick right now contact your doctor or Healthline on 0800 611 116 for medical help. If it is an emergency call 111.

item.text: Healthline is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week if you need them. If you need to see your GP or doctor in person, always call before leaving your home to tell them you have been in contact with measles.
You may now close this page.
